lines: 1. Hosi I N’wini Wa Hina Yeso Khokholo Ra Hina,
U Susa Na Wona Nchavo, Yeso Khokholo Ra Hina.
Khokholo Lera Matimba, Xisirhelelo Vudyohwen Mufambisi Ku Ya Ekaya, Yeso Khokholo Ra Hina.
2. Wa Hi Lwela Eka Nala, Yesu Khokholo Ra Hina, A Ku Na Xo Hi Tshukisa, Yeso Khokholo Ra Hina.
3. Hambi A Hlundzuka Nala, Yesu Khokholo Ra Hina,
Hi Kuma Ku Hlayiseka Yesu Khokholo Ra Hina
4. Yesu Hi Ye Mukutsuri, Yesu Khokholo Ra Hina,
Hi Wena Mupfuni Werhu, Yesu Khokholo Ra Hina.
